skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a strong focus on creating responsive and visually appealing web interfaces. Experienced in using modern frontend libraries and frameworks, such as React, to build interactive user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in developing server-side applications using languages like Python and Node.js and server deployment to ensure efficient and secure backend operations.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Passionate about crafting intuitive and user-centered designs. Proficient in creating wireframes, prototypes, and mockups using tools like Figma. Dedicated to delivering visually pleasing and functional user experiences.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Experienced in using Vs code to design and develop responsive websites. Proficient in leveraging Vs code's features to create visually appealing and interactive web projects.
